name: TRACE_STREAM
description: Primary stream for trace ingestion events. Stores LLM trace data for analytics and debugging.

_comment.max_msgs: Maximum 1 million messages per stream (oldest discarded when exceeded)
_comment.max_bytes: Storage limit: 5GB (5368709120 bytes). Prevents unbounded growth.
_comment.max_age: Retention: 7 days (604800000000000 nanoseconds). Data older than 7 days is auto-deleted.
_comment.max_msg_size: Maximum single message size: 1MB. Prevents oversized payloads.
_comment.discard: Oldest messages are discarded when storage/message limits are reached.
_comment.storage: File-based storage for durability and persistence across restarts.
